response.summary: Mechanical Engineer with 5Y of experience in the Oil & Gas Industry as a Machinery and Packaged Equipment Engineer. Experience as Machinery Field Engineer in an Ethylene plant. Specialized in rotating equipment and packaged units. Knowledge in API 610, API 682, API 686, API 617, ANSI/HI, ASME B73.1, ASME, IEC, and IEEE, among other standards applicable to the oil and gas industry. Able to define the most suitable equipment as per Project/Client/Standards technical requirements. Fully capable to perform technical negotiations, and revision of Vendor drawings. Understanding of commercial matters associated with projects. Full proficiency in English and knowledge of French and Italian.
response.skills: Ingeniería mecánica, Creative thinking, Problem Solving, Logical Reasoning, Energy Industry, Oil & Gas Industry, Pumps, Oil & Gas, Petrochemical, Analytical Skills, EPC, Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD, Autodesk Inventor, Microsoft Office, Liderazgo, Servicio de atención al cliente, Pensamiento crítico, Pensamiento creativo, Management

profile_positions.description: Mechanical Engineer providing field support for LSP Olefins Project.
profile_positions.title: Package Field Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Machinery Field Engineer for Long Son Petrochemical Project, Olefins Package A1, Ba Ria, Vietnam. 

Providing technical support for Construction and PCCSU phases. 

Typical duties include providing resolution for levelling, shaft alignment, grouting, and soft foot issues. In charge to provide At-Site technical decisions to solve problems for rotating equipment including API and Non-API pumps, centrifugal compressors, ID fans, and Chemical packages. 

TPSK consortium.
profile_positions.title: Machinery Field Engineer

profile_positions.description: Engineer specialist in rotating equipment including centrifugal and positive displacement pumps, reciprocating compressors, and packaged units such as chemical injection skids and other process units. In charge of preparing requisitions, performing technical alignments, and revision/approval of technical documents and drawings.
profile_positions.title: Machinery and Packaged Unit Specialist
